title: Power Bank 15000mAh, iXCC Portable Charger Ultra High Capacity External Battery Pack with ChargeWise Tech 2.4 Max Maximum Dual Ports Speed Charging for iPhone, iPad, Samsung Galaxy - Black
feature: ❤Compact Design: Same size like iPhone 7 make it easy to be carried with Just one hand. The Size and Weight is 20% Smaller than normal power bank yet with 20% More Capacity. Pocket Friendly.

❤High Capacity: 15k mAh rechareges 5 times iPhone 7, 3.5 times Galaxy S7, 2 times iPad mini 4. Perfect for travel, Business trip, Mobile Gamer, Pokeman go with 2000+ Recharge Cycle.One Cost Twice the Fun.

❤Multi-SafeGuard: Surge Short Circuit Detection and Prevention to guarantee you and your device's safety. Anodized Aluminum Case Enhances grip and prevents smudges and fingerprints.Impact Vibration Extreme Temp Tested.

❤What You Get: 1 x Portable Charger, 1 x Micro USB Cable.This portable charger comes with a 2-year limited manufacturer's warranty.To acheive maximum efficiency Please Use the included cable, your original cable or a third-party certified one like MFi.
